feed.title: Combined summary - [c-lightning] Welcoming a New C-lightning Core Team Member!

entry.title: Combined summary - [c-lightning] Welcoming a New C-lightning Core Team Member!
entry.summary: A member of the Lightning Development mailing list, ZmnSCPxj, raised concerns over the security of commits to the Lightning Network project. In a message posted to the list, he questioned whether his GPG setup was adequate and suggested that his commit access be revoked if necessary. It is unclear what prompted these concerns, but ZmnSCPxj provided a link to a previous discussion on the topic. The conversation continued as other members of the Lightning-dev discussion asked for more information about ZmnSCPxj's specific difficulties with GPG setup. Additionally, a signature attachment of type 'application/pgp-signature' from Peter Todd's email was included in the thread.
